keyMappings:
# Emacs keybindings for firefox
# Heavily inspired by Chromemacs

unmapAll

# Navigating the current page
map <c-h> showHelp
map <c-b> scrollLeft
map <c-n> scrollDown
map <c-p> scrollUp
map <c-f> scrollRight
map <c-m-,> scrollToTop
map <c-m-.> scrollToBottom
map <c-v> scrollPageDown
map <m-v> scrollPageUp
map <c-x><c-f> LinkHints.activateMode
map <c-x><a-F> LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map <m-r> reload
map <a-s> viewSource
map <c-g><c-u> copyCurrentUrl
map <c-g><c-l> LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
map <c-x>o nextFrame

# Navigating to new pages
map <c-x><c-d> Vomnibar.activate
map <c-x><c-D> Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map <c-x><c-b> Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map <c-x><c-B> Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab

# Using find
map <c-s> enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind

# Navigating history
map <c-m-b> goBack
map <c-m-f> goForward

# Manipulating tabs
map <c-b> previousTab
map <c-f> nextTab
map <c-x><up> firstTab
map <c-x><down> lastTab
map <c-g><c-t> createTab
map <c-x>4 duplicateTab
map <c-x>0 removeTab
map <c-g><c-r> restoreTab
map <c-x>b Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map <c-x>5 moveTabToNewWindow
map <a-p> togglePinTab

# Using marks
#map m Marks.activateCreateMode
#map ` Marks.activateGotoMode

# Additional browsing commands
map <c-g><left> goNext
map <c-g><right> goPrevious
map <a-f> LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map <c-g><c-f> focusInput
map <c-g>< goUp
map <c-g>/ goToRoot
map <c-x>< scrollToLeft
map <c-x>> scrollToRight
